para_sentences.para_0: After successful completion of this module, you will be able to ...

ol_0: Use PyCharm to clone an assignment to a GitHub repository and create a PyCharm project for it
Write Python code in that project and use PyCharm to commit and push changes to your GitHub repository
Use Gradescope to submit the code in your GitHub repository for grading
Get started on a programming task by using some general problem solving principles
Recall some of the basic context of computer programming
ul_0: What's a good general approach to solving problems?
What are algorithms? What are computers? What are computer languages? What is Python?
